leaseStartRangeStart.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. This nodes allows to send different rent amount for different move in dates but with same intervals. Refer Property setting: Price By Lease Start Range. E.g Property has pricing setup to have 3 days interval pricing then data can looks like, leaseStartRangeStart:0 leaseStartRa ngeEnd:2 amount:700 Zero represents current date or unit`s available on the date [if available on a date is in future]. If sending "isRenewal" as true this value should always be sent as 0

leaseStartRangeEnd.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. This nodes allows to send different rent amount for different move in dates but with the same intervals. wrapper_tool.name: get_vendors

description.tagline: Retrieve a list of vendors for a given organization.
description.detailed: This tool fetches vendor information from Entrata for a specified organization. Use it to obtain a comprehensive list of vendors associated with an organization ID.

wrapper_tool.return_annotation: List of vendors for the specified organization.

arguments.name: organization_subdomain
arguments.description: The subdomain representing the organization to retrieve vendors for.

arguments.name: vendor_request_body
arguments.description: Provide the request body as a JSON array for fetching vendor data. This should include any necessary parameters required by the API to process the vendor data request.

arguments.name: page_number
arguments.description: The page number for pagination of the vendor list.

arguments.name: items_per_page
arguments.description: The number of items to return per page in the response for pagination.

arguments.name: include_pagination_links
arguments.description: Set to 1 to include pagination links in the response body, 0 to exclude.
